A Halloween-themed television special which includes portions from both Disney's Halloween Treat (1982) and Disney's Greatest Villains (1977) featuring classic short cartoons and exerpts of various villains from Disney feature films. First aired on October 1, 1983, this VHS recording is from a later televised broadcast on the Disney Channel in the 1990s.
